title: In a knot
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Prevention and control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural disasters
abstract: "Hot, cranky, felt sick, stomach in a knot". Warburton resident Eliza describes her emotions and reactions to the 'Black Saturday' bushfires of February 2009.
description: 'Warburton, which is practically my life.' A sparse story, fairly poetic, about her stress and anxiety and fighting with her family. Amazing photos - from a light plane looking over the 'Black Saturday' affected areas.
